metadata.title: Rare Items, Worth More Than Life Itself

tracks.text: Silhouettes of Towa, Kei, Rakuro and Rei stand in front of portraits of their SLF characters Pencilgon, Oikatzo, Sunraku, and Psyger-0.
Text, Original Work, Katarina, Ryosuke Fuji. Serialized by Kodansha in Weekly Shounen Magazine
Rakuro wears a VR headset. The ID Shard, a diamond shaped pendant, swings in darkness.
Thirdrema, a western style town, stands at the foot of a hill with a castle at the top.
The sun sets and day turns to night.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier
Rakuro turns into Sunraku, who wields twin marsh daggers
Red water gurgles
Pencilgon descends to the ground and strikes with a spear
Katzo draws a red fist and black fist together, and her fists burst crimson.
Emul, Elke, Vash, Bilac, and Peitz walk along the Rabbituza palace verandah.
Psyger-0 and Psyger-100 stand back to back in a board room
Setsuna walks. Beyond her is the gnarled tree, high cliffs, and full moon.
Wethermon, a metal samurai, stares at us with glowing eyes. Fire licks his arms, shoulders, and stomach.
Kirin, a metal horse, rears in front of a red moon
A golden Reward Scales shift
Sunraku wields the decapitators strikes liches that surround him in a misty, purple forest.
Dozens of shadowy figures stand on outcroppings. Their eyes glow red.
Pencilgon swings a spear in mist
A Dullahan and its horse gallop. She strikes
Katzo does a flying back flip over wyvern zombies.
Wethermon draws a sword. The moon reflects in a muddy puddle. A drop splashes. Psyger-0 holds a sword, her long red plume blowing in the wind.
In a library, a girl with long pink braids and wide, green eyes smiles widely and reaches out a hand.
The Rebirth Tearjewel lands on Sunraku's abs and glows
Sunraku grips a moon blade. Wearing a beetle helmet and diamond shaped pendant, he runs forward. Katzo with red fists and Pencilgon with a spear run with him.
In slow motion, they approach the samurai. The world turns red.
Purple mist. Drifting ash.
Sunraku stretches at the bottom of cliffs.
Text, 24, Rare items, worth more than life itself
He scales a tall cliff in a single jump
He climbs to the top of the cliff.
Crystals cover the cliff top. Motes of light sparkle
Text, Crystal Nest Cliff
A crystal moves. The crystal scorpion reaches its pincers around Sunraku
The scorpion grabs at him. He dodges.
Label, Crystal scorpion
It charges
It strikes with its tail. He dodges.
He lands on a crystal. The scorpion's pincer strikes. He dodges as the crystal breaks.
The scorpion charges. He leaps over its body
He runs past the scorpion, evading a tail, and leaps up a crystal.
The ground trembles.
A dozen scorpions gather on nearby crystals.
Label, Crystal Scorpions
The hoard leaps
Shattered crystals fill the air
Rabbituza Inn
Players walk the streets of Eighthold
In an alleyway
A white door appears
Sunraku walks through
Crystals
Sunraku climbs up
A black, spiky crystal with glittering blue veins
He approaches
Equips pick axe
The ground shakes
2 scorpions emerge
They descend on him
He leaps
Scorpion tail
He respawns
He turns to look at an unamused Emul
Blue, cubic crystals
He lies down
She tucks him in
His eye lids grow heavy
A potion appears in her hand
He swings her over his head
In the crystal nest, shards of crystals go flying.
Sunraku runs
The scorpion chases
He stops
Scorpions surround him
They leap at him
He leaps up in the air
The remaining scorpions snap their pincers at him as he falls
They snap at him as he disappears
They look around. In the inventoria, Sunraku smiles.
He lands in the crystal nest
No scorpions, but several crystalline drops litter the area
Dropped items, crystal leg, crystal scorpion's carapace, crystal pincer, crystal talon
He punches a crystal
Scorpions
5 leap
He lands on a crystal and looks around at 9 drops
He taps a foot
A scorpion shatters crystals and hovers behind Sunraku
He equips moon blades
Stinger strikes
He strikes the tail
More scorpions
on the stinger
Several strike. He disappears. The stinger cracks.
He falls to a circle of pincers
He punches the ground
Text, 29, Records of Battles with Lycagon
He presses the "Equip" button. Dialog, Cannot equip.
He repeatedly presses. The dialog repeatedly appears.
Rakuro eats breakfast
At the game store
Rabbituza
Raw meat on a pick axe
Burning torch
Candles on the head
